de.payleven.payment

Interface PaymentTask

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaylevenPaymentTask

    public interface PaymentTask
    Allows to start a payment.
    See Also:
    Payleven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Attempts to cancel the payment.
      PaymentProgressState getPaymentProgressState()
      Returns PaymentProgressState.
      PaymentResult startAndWait(SignatureRequestListener signatureListener, PaymentProgressListener paymentProgressListener)
      Runs the task synchronously.
      void startAsync(PaymentListener listener)
      Starts the task and runs it on a background thread.

    • Method Detail

      • startAsync

        void startAsync(PaymentListener listener)
        Starts the task and runs it on a background thread. All callback methods of the listener will be called on the main thread. The task may be run only once. If you need to make the same payment, the new PaymentTask must be created.
        Parameters:
        listener - handle callbacks when the task is completed
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the task is running or has already finished

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Attempts to cancel the payment. If the payment is already in the approval stage, it won't be cancelled. You must wait for the payment task to finish in order to check the real state of the payment.

      • startAndWait

        PaymentResult startAndWait(SignatureRequestListener signatureListener,
                         PaymentProgressListener paymentProgressListener)
        Runs the task synchronously.
        Parameters:
        signatureListener - triggered if signature is required to verify the payment transaction
        paymentProgressListener - triggered when PaymentProgressState changed.
        Returns:
        result of the finished payment
        Throws:
        NetworkError - in case network or internet can not be accessed
        BluetoothError - if there was a problem with bluetooth communication
        AuthorizationError - in case server failed to authorize the payment request. In this case it is required to re-register via PaylevenFactory
        PaylevenError - an unexpected error. This is also a superclass of all other Payleven errors, so you may want to only handle this error which indicates that some kind of error has occurred

      • getPaymentProgressState

        PaymentProgressState getPaymentProgressState()
        Returns PaymentProgressState.
        Returns:
        state of the payment.
